trans-unit.source: SUBSTRING
trans-unit.target: SUBSTRING

trans-unit.source: SUBSTRING (Azure Stream Analytics)
trans-unit.target: SUBSTRING (Azure Stream Analytics)

trans-unit.source: Returns part of a character or a text.
trans-unit.target: Returns part of a character or a text.

trans-unit.source: Syntax
trans-unit.target: Syntax

trans-unit.source: The index/position for the SUBSTRING function is 1 based.
trans-unit.target: The index/position for the SUBSTRING function is 1 based.

trans-unit.source: Arguments
trans-unit.target: Arguments

trans-unit.source: expression
trans-unit.target: expression

trans-unit.source: Is a character expression or a column of type nvarchar(max).
trans-unit.target: Is a character expression or a column of type nvarchar(max).

trans-unit.source: start
trans-unit.target: start

trans-unit.source: Is a bigint expression that specifies where the returned characters start.
trans-unit.target: Is a bigint expression that specifies where the returned characters start.

trans-unit.source: If start is less than 1, the returned expression will begin at the first character that is specified in expression.
trans-unit.target: If start is less than 1, the returned expression will begin at the first character that is specified in expression.

trans-unit.source: In this case, the number of characters that are returned is the largest value of either the sum of start + length- 1 or 0.
trans-unit.target: In this case, the number of characters that are returned is the largest value of either the sum of start + length- 1 or 0.

trans-unit.source: If start is greater than the number of characters in the value expression, a zero-length expression is returned.
trans-unit.target: If start is greater than the number of characters in the value expression, a zero-length expression is returned.

trans-unit.source: length
trans-unit.target: length

trans-unit.source: Is a positive bigint expression that specifies how many characters of the expression will be returned.
trans-unit.target: Is a positive bigint expression that specifies how many characters of the expression will be returned.

trans-unit.source: If length is negative, an error is generated and the statement is terminated.
trans-unit.target: If length is negative, an error is generated and the statement is terminated.

trans-unit.source: If the sum of start and length is greater than the number of characters in expression, the whole value expression beginning at start is returned
trans-unit.target: If the sum of start and length is greater than the number of characters in expression, the whole value expression beginning at start is returned

trans-unit.source: Return Types
trans-unit.target: Return Types

trans-unit.source: nvarchar(max)
trans-unit.target: nvarchar(max)

trans-unit.source: Examples
trans-unit.target: Examples
